meanings.definition: A guide used to indicate that a file has been removed from a filing system.
meanings.sent1: The outguides in the filing cabinet show which files have been taken out.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to put the outguides in place after removing a file from the system.
meanings.sent3: The outguides in the drawer like to play hide and seek with the files.
meanings.sent4: The outguides stood like silent sentinels, marking the absence of the files.
meanings.sent5: The bright red outguides make it easy to spot missing files at a glance.

meanings.definition: To guide or direct someone out of a place or situation.
meanings.sent1: She outguides visitors to the exit after the tour.
meanings.sent2: The park ranger outguides lost hikers back to the trail.
meanings.sent3: The GPS outguides drivers with its soothing voice directions.
meanings.sent4: His intuition outguides him through tough decisions like a compass in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The teacher outguides the students through the complex topic with ease.
